title: Best of The Herd for Aug 12, 2020
itunes:title: Best of The Herd for Aug 12, 2020
description:
College Football should privatize and break away from other sports

Damian Lillard is Allen Iverson

The Lakers are in trouble in round 1

The Raiders are set up for an awful season

The Seahawks are the Texans with a slightly better QB

College Football is getting even more Southern and it's a problem


Guest: Brock Huard, Fox Sports College Football Analyst

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
